Specimen Type: Fresh sputum, bronchoalveolar lavage, gastric lavage, urine, tissue, pleural fluid
Purpose: To culture, detect, and identify mycobacterial infections through standardized processing, incubation, and interpretation of AFB growth.
Equipment: Class II biosafety cabinet, Mycobacterial Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) system, Lowenstein-Jensen slants, Middlebrook 7H10 plates, incubator (35–37 °C), Ziehl-Neelsen staining kit
